nodes.text: The Empire established a small outpost on the planet Dantooine during the Galactic Civil War. In 1 ABY, Colonel Veers stayed at this outpost for a short time.
The outpost consisted of a small watchtower built between small hills in a remote location of Dantooine. Imperial troopers patrolled the area.

This outpost is a location in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It was added for the Cries of Alderaan story arc in 2003 as one of five small Imperial outposts. Imperial players were sent to these locations during the second act to meet with an Imperial Commander who sents the player to a communications outpost to relay a message to Doctor Vacca. During the third act of the story arc, the players were once again randomly sent to one of the five locations to meet with Colonel Veers, who asks the player to attack a research facility.
